verses.text: And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* there \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* to \w defend|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w Tola|strong="H8439"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Puah|strong="H6312"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dodo|strong="H1734"\w*, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*; and he \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Shamir|strong="H8069"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.\f + \fr 10.1 \ft defend: or, deliver: Heb. save\f*

And he \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in \w Shamir|strong="H8069"\w*.

¶ And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w*, a \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w*, and \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And he had \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* that \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* on \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* ass \w colts|strong="H5895"\w*, and they had \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, which are \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Havoth-jair|strong="H2334"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, which \add are\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.\f + \fr 10.4 \ft Havoth-jair: or, the villages of Jair\f*
And \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in \w Camon|strong="H7056"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w*, and the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, and the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, and the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* not him.

And the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w hot|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and he \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* them into the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and into the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*.

And that \w year|strong="H8141"\w* they \w vexed|strong="H7492"\w* and \w oppressed|strong="H7533"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \add were\add* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \add is\add* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.\f + \fr 10.8 \ft oppressed: Heb. crushed\f*

Moreover the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* also against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and against \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*; so that \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* was \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w distressed|strong="H3334"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, We have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee, both because we have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and also \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add Did\add* not \add I deliver you\add* from the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, and from the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and from the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*?

The \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w* also, and the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*, and the \w Maonites|strong="H4584"\w*, did \w oppress|strong="H3905"\w* you; and ye \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* to me, and I \w delivered|strong="H3467"\w* you out of their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Yet ye have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: wherefore I will \w deliver|strong="H3467"\w* you no \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* which ye have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*; let \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w deliver|strong="H3467"\w* you in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of your \w tribulation|strong="H6869"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, We have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*: \w do|strong="H6213"\w* thou unto us whatsoever \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto thee; \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* us only, we pray thee, this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 10.15 \ft seemeth…: Heb. is good in thine eyes\f*

And they put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* was \w grieved|strong="H7114"\w* for the \w misery|strong="H5999"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 10.16 \ft strange…: Heb. gods of strangers\f*\f + \fr 10.16 \ft grieved: Heb. shortened\f*

Then the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H6817"\w*, and \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*. And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* assembled themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*.\f + \fr 10.17 \ft gathered: Heb. cried\f*

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add and\add* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, What \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is he\add* that will \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*? he shall be \w head|strong="H7218"\w* over all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.
